prompts: Create a muscular Pokemon that excels in hand-to-hand combat with vibrant colors.
I want a fighting-type Pokemon that showcases powerful arm muscles and a strong stance.
Generate an image of a bipedal Pokemon with a striking pose and a confident expression.
Make a character design for a Pokemon that embodies strength and determination in battle.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines fighting spirit with a bold color palette and distinctive features.
Design a robust Pokemon with unique physical traits that highlight its combat abilities.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the essence of a martial artist with its powerful build.
